Title: Germany sees anti-Pride events and restricts rainbow flags ahead of LGBTQ+ parties
Description:
The head of parliament banned the rainbow flag from the legislative building.
Far-right groups have rallied against the LGBTQ+ community and attacks are on the rise.
It all casts a shadow over Pride.

Title: Trump and Fed chairman clash over renovation site cost. And, Gaza peace talks stalled
Description:
Trump and Fed Chairman Jerome Powell clashed over the cost of renovations to the Federal Reserve headquarters.
And, ceasefire talks between Israel and Hamas stalled yesterday.

Title: Fearing coverage could change, some parents rush to vaccinate their kids
Description:
Health Secretary Robert F.
Kennedy Jr.
is changing how federal agencies handle vaccine recommendations.
Some parents are hurrying to get kids their shots, fearing future changes could limit access.

Title: Russia tried stretching the service life of its aging An-24 planes past 50 years. One just crashed with dozens on board.
